}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== (OEM [[SparkLAN]])
*[[QCA]] Model: [[Qualcomm Atheros QCNFA344A|QCNFA344A]] (NGFF M.2 2230 Key A/E) :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PPD-QCNFA344A PPD-QCNFA344A] (05/01/2015) :OEM: [[Lite-On WCBN807A]] (see PPage)
*[http://site.embeddedworks.net/blog/2016/12/17/sparklan-wnfq-258acnbt-wifi-bluetooth-combo-solution-m-2-module/ ''SparkLAN WNFQ-258ACN(BT)'' on '''EmbeddedWorks'''] :[[Lite-On WCBN807A]]-AA - [[Foxconn T77H644.01]] (Acer) :[[Lite-On WCBN807A]]-Q2 - [[Qualcomm Atheros QCNFA344A]] :[[Lite-On WCBN807A]]-L8 - [http://www.b2bzero.kr/shop/item.php?it_id=G0041 LG Electronics 15U470-GAR30ML]
===Specifications=== :‧ Chipset: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA6174A-5 (MAC/BB/RF) :‧ Standard: 802.11abgn/ac 2T2R (867Mbps) MU-MIMO :‧ Interface: M.2 Card (PCIe: WLAN; USB 2.0: Bluetooth) :‧ Bluetooth: V 4.1, V 4.0 LE, V 3.0 + HS, V 2.1 + EDR :‧ Antenna: 2x MHF4 connector, 2T2R; BT/WLAN co-existence :‧ Supports 20/40MHz (2.4GHz) and 20/40/80MHz (5GHz) :‧ Enhanced wireless security: WEP, WPA, WPA2, WPS, 802.1x :‧ Concurrent Wi-Fi and BT co-existence, support Windows
==See also== *[[Lite-On WCBN804A]] - [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA6174 (2T2R) :802.11ac WiFi + BT M.2 Module • [[SparkLAN WNFQ-255ACN(BT)]] *[[Lite-On WCBN806A]] - [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9377 (1T1R) :802.11ac WiFi + BT M.2 Module • [[SparkLAN WNFQ-158ACN(BT)]] :[[Lite-On]] WCBN806A-S6 (<del>WCBN604BH-L6</del>) ([https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2973099 FCC Label Sample]) *[[Lite-On WCBN807A]] - [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA6174A-5 (2T2R) :802.11ac WiFi + BT M.2 Module • [[SparkLAN WNFQ-258ACN(BT)]] *[[Lite-On WCBN808A]] - [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA6174A-5 (2T2R) :802.11ac WiFi + BT M.2 Module • [[Rivet Networks NGFF525A]]
